heading: Sammy Wilson At The Centre Of Misplaced Money Scandal
body: They called themselves "Sammy Wilson's finest", but when they emerged from the crowd they had to acknowledge that Sammy Wilson himself was quite in the right at this stage. Well, Sammy has got a bit better since, but I think the money is all there as we say in Belfast, but I'm not sure Sammy really does want it. There was no discernible disagreement between him and Joe Gilmore. Well it did make it a bit difficult to get to the bottom of it, I mean, it was all going on as you say. There was no agreement on where the money was.
